Installing the Polarion Chrome Plugin
Download and install the following extension:


You can find this Extension on the POP Extension Portal on www.polarion.com. Try to find it via the menu or search and follow the installation instructions.

Direct Link:  http://extensions.polarion.com/polarion/extensions/extension.jsp?extension=PE-455 


Example Image:
Hint: The extension conflicts  with Polarion´s script widget so if you are using it make sure it is only enabled while working with wiki pages.
Additionally the extension shows only the first 100 lines of your code (there is another limit at 300 lines). If you want to see the rest of your code place your curso into line 100 add a letter and remove it diretly. Your page will be expanded.
